data.eml:eml: Systematic revision of the Andean butterfly genus Orophila Staudinger, 1886 (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae: Biblidinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zubek, Anna, Pyrcz, Tomasz, Lorenc-Brudecka, Jadwiga, Boyer, Pierre, Cerdeña, Jose, Mahecha-Jiménez, Oscar, Huertas, Blanca (2017): Systematic revision of the Andean butterfly genus Orophila Staudinger, 1886 (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae: Biblidinae). Zootaxa 4258 (5): 443-461, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.5.3
